cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1158, Refugee Sanitation Facility Safety Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 31 (Thursday, February 18, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MENG:
H.R. 1158.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H538]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Refugee Sanitation Facility Safety Act of 2021
